# [Interview #460: TGS Signing Report - Meg Lurvey, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=460#13)

#### Question

Do you have plans to write a longer series?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes,
*The Way of Kings*
will come out next year.
